content:
Is anyone else experiencing an issue where changes to one .lean file don't seem to propagate to other .lean files when using Lean 4 with VS Code?
E.g. I have a file A.lean and B.lean where B.lean imports A. When I add a lemma a to A.lean, that lemma can only be used from B.lean, once I quit and restart VS Code.
You can do Restart Lean Server via the Ctrl-P menu
Marcus Rossel has marked this topic as resolved.
